creative_recommendations.issue: Creative Fatigue - "Breathable bamboo that moves with you — limited offer on men briefs."

creative_recommendations.new_creative: Experience the Comfort: New breathable bamboo briefs for men. Limited-time offer!

creative_recommendations.issue: Doctors recommend creatives - Shift focus from doctors to core benefits to avoid ad fatigue.

creative_recommendations.new_creative: Stay Cool & Comfortable All Day! Discover our breathable cotton boyshorts for women.
creative_recommendations.reasoning: While 'doctors recommend' initially worked, it appears to be fatiguing. Switching to a benefit-driven message ('Stay Cool & Comfortable') and a clear product description may re-engage the audience.
